name: Notice.AAA6.GeneralApps.MoreInfoRequired.Respondent
titleCy: Rhaid i chi ddarparu mwy o wybodaeth
descriptionEn: The court has responded to the application. You must upload a document providing more information to the court by 4pm on ${judgeRequestMoreInfoByDateEn}.
descriptionCy: Mae’r llys wedi ymateb i’r cais. Rhaid i chi uwchlwytho dogfen sy’n rhoi mwy o wybodaeth i’r llys erbyn 4pm ar ${judgeRequestMoreInfoByDateCy}.
